text: Joost R. Hiltermann is the Program Director, MENA for International Crisis Group. He was previously its Chief Operating Officer.Joost Hiltermann, The New York Review of Books ==Education== Hiltermann earned an MA degree in International Relations from Johns Hopkins School of Advanced International Studies in 1980, and a PhD in Sociology from University of California, Santa Cruz in 1988. ==Published works== *A Poisonous Affair: America, Iraq, and the Gassing of Halabja Cambridge University Press (2007) amazon.com A Poisonous Affair: America, Iraq, and the Gassing of Halabja *Behind the Intifada: Labor and Women’s Movements in the Occupied Territories Princeton University Press (1991) ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
